name: Shooter (julien.villegas)
description:
Shooter is an Arcade / Retro / Shoot'em up game with a twist and 2020 visuals. 

It takes some exciting, proven concepts and blends them to create something new and original.Think R-Type (Shoot'em up) meets Pang (classic bubbles burster) and you get Shooter.

The enemies paths and behaviours are not pre-defined; they are gravity driven, and the center of gravity is ... you. As you progress, based on the mass and velocity of the enemies, swarms of bubbles begin chasing you around.

The game is trully challenging game. You will get killed. It is hard and unforgiving. You do have a check-point after each chapter, but to reach that chapter you will need to master each level. So fear not if you need to try over and over.
